useCase.name: Indicate Component Name

preconditions.precondition: Repository Manager access component update form

useCase.trigger: User indicates need to update component name

mainSequence.step: Repository Manager accesses component update form
DIMS Interface requests current component details
Component Management System queries current component information
Component Management System displays current component information
Repository Manager inputs new component name
DIMS Interface validates new name and prepares update
Component Management System updates component name
Component Management System confirms name update
Component Management System confirms update to Repository Manager
DIMS Interface displays update confirmation to Repository Manager
